sentences.en: Early settlers built frames of spruce, maple and pine.
sentences.cn: 早期的定居者用云杉木、枫木和松木建造屋架。

sentences.en: He dug a hole in our yard on Edgerton Avenue to plant a maple tree when I was born.
sentences.cn: 我出生的时候，他在埃杰顿大街我们家的园圃里挖了个坑，种了棵枫树。

sentences.en: Maple sugar is made from the sap of maple trees.
sentences.cn: 枫糖是由枫树的树液制成的.

sentences.en: Maple syrup is made from sap extracted from the sugar maple tree.
sentences.cn: 槭糖浆是用糖槭树中提取的树液制成的。

sentences.en: Now the maple leaves are tinged with autumn red.
sentences.cn: 现在枫叶微带秋天的红色.

sentences.en: Put the maple leaves in between the pages.
She was stoking the stove with sticks of maple.
sentences.cn: 她正在往炉子里添枫树枝。

sentences.en: Sugar maple trees grow in Ontario.
sentences.cn: 糖槭树(枫树)也生长在安大略.

sentences.en: The Cup was won for the third consecutive year by the Toronto Maple Leafs.
sentences.cn: 多伦多枫叶队连续第三年捧杯。

sentences.en: The house stood amid maple trees.
sentences.cn: 那房子坐落在枫树林中.

sentences.en: The Japanese maple that stands across the drive had just come into leaf.
sentences.cn: 他拾起一张宣传保护牙齿的传单。

sentences.en: The maple leaves are tinge with autumn red.
sentences.cn: 枫叶染上了秋天的红色.

sentences.en: The maple trees were in their autumn glory of russets, reds and browns.
sentences.cn: 正值秋季，赤褐色、红色和棕色的枫树绚烂夺目。

trans.tran_en: a tree which grows mainly in northern countries such as Canada. Its leaves have five points and turn red or gold in autumn.
